name: Ronan the Kababarian
description:
Ronan the Kababarian is an action-cooking game, where you assume the role of R.O.N.A.N, a kabab making robot. Match three of the same ingredient on a single spear to score points in this relaxing cook'em up!

Ronan the Kababarian is the second of our Pinecone Games a series of small games released a few times a month.

By supporting this game you are helping kick start our studio and help us produce more games! 

Please consider supporting us on Patreon to get all our new releases for free. Also, join our Discord!

Thank you and enjoy!
